document_data.name: Nar fiendbond
document_data.mainbody: '''''Nar fiendbond''''' was a [[transmutation]] spell that transformed a person into a [[half-fiend]]. It was presumably developed by the [[Narfell|Nars]].
document_data.Effects: The spell imbued a volunteer or victim with the essence of the [[fiendish planes]], granting them powers as if they were the offspring of a full-blooded [[fiend]].
document_data.Components: The spell required a fortune in [[gem]]s.
